document_data.mainbody:
Bristar (called Velethuil by its elven inhabitants
The name "Bristar" is a contraction of the name "Brightstar".
The elves of Bristar were particularly protective of Lake Eredruie, a sacred pool of water whose waters had healing properties to elves and half-elves.
Following the great Retreat of the elves to the island nation of Evermeet, the elves of Bristar that chose to stay on the mainland allied themselves with Deepingdale over the Elven Courtâ€“aligned settlement of Semberholme. This decision added to the communitys strength and prosperity in the wake of an overall decreased elven population.
